definitions.definition: An illegal immigrant of any country.
definitions.example: 1990: United States. Congress. Senate. Committee on the Judiciary, Confirmation Hearings on Federal Appointments: Hearings Before the Committee - An agent, Larry Moy, when asked to define the derivation of the term “tonk,” replied: “...it's the sound of flashlight hitting somebody's head, tonk". [This "derivation" is incorrect - see Etymology]

definitions.definition: An item of value, or of perceived value, especially for sale.
definitions.example: How much tonk have we got to shift?
